item.description: Application Discovery Service #aws #cloud #cloud-migration This is a service from AWS which helps you plan application migration projects. It automatically identifies servers, virtual machines (VMs), and network dependencies in your on-premises data centers.
AWS DataSync #cloud #aws #cloud-migration A data migration service from AWS that helps on moving data securely online between on-premises and AWS storage services ( EFS, S3, FSX) .

Database Migration Service (DMS) #aws #cloud #cloud-migration #databases AWS DMS is a database migration solution by AWS to migrate onprem to cloud or even from any cloud database to another type of database server hosted on cloud.
Migration & Transfer #aws #cloud #cloud-migration Migrating to AWS could be done with seven common migration strategies (7 Rs) for moving applications to the AWS Cloud.
AWS Server Migration Service (SMS) #aws #cloud #cloud-migration It is a managed service from AWS to make migration of on premise service easy to be lifted and shifted to AWS.
Snowball Family #aws #cloud #snowball #storage #cloud-migration This service is for migrating large volume of data to AWS with Low Cost data transfer service (Petabyte Scale).
